## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

```{r datasets with low uncertainty }
#observed data set
load("../data/L_wiedii_lowUnc.RData")
observed <-
  dplyr::select(L_wiedii_lowUnc_naMean,
    decimalLatitude,
    decimalLongitude,
    species)
EOO.computing(observed, exclude.area = T, country_map = land)

#Calculate a z-statistic for the EOO of the original data set compared to the EOO values of the 100 random iterations

(
  EOO.computing(observed, exclude.area = T, country_map = land)$EOO - mean(L_wiedii_low_1000georanges$naMean_EOO)
) / sd(L_wiedii_low_1000georanges$naMean_EOO)

#100 itertion is -0.5995791 (493.31 sec elapsed)
#1000 iteration is -0.4048546

hist(L_wiedii_low_naMean_geo_range_1000$Mean_EOO,
  main = "L. wiediee extent of occurrence, with mean ucertainty values for NA values")
abline(v = EOO.computing(observed, exclude.area = T, country_map = land)$EOO,
  col = "red")

(
  EOO.computing(observed, exclude.area = T, country_map = land)$EOO - mean(L_wiedii_low_100georanges$naMean_EOO)
) / sd(L_wiedii_low_100georanges$naMean_EOO)



----
  
  (
  EOO.computing(observed, exclude.area = T, country_map = land)$EOO - mean(L_wiedii_low_1000georanges$naZero_EOO)
) / sd(L_wiedii_low_1000georanges$naZero_EOO)

  (
  EOO.computing(observed, exclude.area = T, country_map = land)$EOO - mean(L_wiedii_low_100georanges$naZero_EOO)
) / sd(L_wiedii_low_100georanges$naZero_EOO)


---
(
  EOO.computing(observed, exclude.area = T, country_map = land)$EOO - mean(L_wiedii_low_naZero_geo_range_100$Zero_EOO)
) / sd(L_wiedii_low_naZero_geo_range_100$Zero_EOO)

#Results:
#100 itertion is -0.9961994
#1000 iteration is -0.8835011 --- 4551.01 sec elapsed

hist(L_wiedii_low_naZero_geo_range_1000$Mean_EOO)
abline(v = EOO.computing(observed, exclude.area = T, country_map = land)$EOO,
  col = "red")

----(
  EOO.computing(observed, exclude.area = T, country_map = land)$EOO - mean(L_wiedii_low_naNA_geo_range_1000$NA_EOO)
) / sd(L_wiedii_low_naNA_geo_range_1000$NA_EOO)

#100 itertion <- 2161.807
hist(L_wiedii_low_naMean_geo_range_100$Mean_EOO)
abline(v = EOO.computing(observed, exclude.area = T, country_map = land)$EOO,
  col = "red")

#1000 itertion <- 1963.668
hist(L_wiedii_low_naMean_geo_range_1000$Mean_EOO)
abline(v = EOO.computing(observed, exclude.area = T, country_map = land)$EOO, col = "red")
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
